description:
Elchi`s bodyguard and servant. He is obsessed with protecting her, and during the second half of the series when she is in the clutches of the Innocent he makes multiple attempts to rescue her and bring her back to normal. He is typically silent although he does speak some basic words along with Elchi`s name later in the series.
During the final battle he appears to have died while protecting Elchi, but to everyone`s surprise suddenly appears alive again in the final scene.
name: Fatman Big
